notes.title: Introduction to HTML
notes.content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is used to create web pages and web applications.

notes.title: CSS Fundamentals
notes.content: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is used to style and layout web pages.

notes.title: JavaScript Basics
notes.content: JavaScript is a programming language used to make web pages interactive.

notes.title: React Introduction
notes.content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

notes.title: Version Control with Git
notes.content: Git is a version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.
